title: Bourgoin and Morris on Maroon culture - context

content.question: Source 1 and Source 2 illustrate which of the following developments associated with maroon communities?

choices.label: They emerged throughout North America and the Caribbean.
They funded the growth of Black schools and businesses.
They often formed alongside Indigenous peoples.
They were known as quilombos throughout Latin America.

content.answer: They emerged throughout North America and the Caribbean.

topic.text: 2.15: Maroon Societies and Autonomous Black Communities

skill.text: 1.A: Identify and explain course concepts, developments, and processes.
